exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds uSA : UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds Unable to unify "IncreasingSeparationAlgebra ?M2113" with "forall m n m1 m2 : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> m <= n -> exists n1 n2 : worlds, join n1 n2 n /\\ m1 <= n1 /\\ m2 <= n2".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall m1 m2 m0 : ?worlds, increasing m0 -> join m1 m2 m0 -> m1 <= m0" on hypothesis of type "worlds".

In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds uSA : UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds m, n, n', H : worlds H0 : join n' H m H1 : m <= n Unable to unify "join n' H m" with "exists n1 n2 : worlds, join n1 n2 n /\\ n' <= n1 /\\ H <= n2".

original: apply Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros m. intros n n' H. unfold increasing. intros. apply incr_split_smaller in H. apply H0.
